key_talking_points: At 2:07 of the first period, Sam Bennett scored a goal (13th of the season), assisted by Carter Verhaeghe (7th assist) and Evan Rodrigues (12th assist). Florida now leads Edmonton 1-0.
The goal was followed immediately by a faceoff at center ice, won by Edmonton's Leon Draisaitl against Florida's Anton Lundell.
for_commentary_agent.context: Florida scored, increasing momentum. Cover the play-by-play surrounding the goal and the following faceoff.

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the goal and immediate reaction. Mention the players involved and the impact on the score.
